title: Handel - 12 Concerti Grossi Op.6 - LP rip!!
description:
The set of three vinyl discs "Handel - 12 Concerti Grossi Op.6" is converted to a digital mp3 format (bitrate 256kbps) with the help of VK-6-LiveSound audio system which preserves the whole "live" contents of the LPs.
Play the recording via good audio equipment and enjoy the finest details of sounding the orchestra.
